contest-event.event-date:
June 20, 1964 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class C)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class C) 520 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-c
None
James Hook
Peniel Farm, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Hymn (own choice): 1 Pendeen, 44 ('Rock of Ages') 2 Bugle, 41 ('Thornbury') 3 St. Breward, 39 ('Pilgrims') 4 Torpoint, 37 ('Crimond')
This was the first contest in the series at which the local village band of Bugle were permitted to compete.
July 25, 2013, 2:29 p.m. Aug. 1, 2013, 8:37 a.m.
1 Pendeen Silver Band Thomas Chainey
2 Bugle Silver Band Hugh Camps
3 St. Breward Silver Band W. D. Lawton
4 Torpoint Town S. F. Sleep
